meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fizzy.
meanings.sent1: The fizzy drinks had a delightful fizziness that tickled my nose.
meanings.sent2: I love the fizzy feeling of the soda's fizziness on my tongue.
meanings.sent3: The fizzy bath bomb created a fun fizziness in the tub.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a contagious fizziness that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy bubbles danced with effervescent fizziness in the glass.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having bubbles or effervescence.
meanings.sent1: The champagne's fizziness added a touch of celebration to the evening.
meanings.sent2: The soda's fizziness made it refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The child's excitement had a fizzy fizziness that was infectious.
meanings.sent4: The sparkling water's fizziness reminded me of tiny dancing fairies.
meanings.sent5: The effervescent fizziness of the drink made it feel like a party in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The sensation of tingling or prickling on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The fizzy sensation of the carbonated water gave me a pleasant fizziness.
meanings.sent2: The tingling fizziness of the minty lip balm was refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The fizzy lotion left a tingling fizziness on my hands.
meanings.sent4: The fizzy pop rocks created a surprising fizziness in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The tingling fizziness of the massage oil relaxed my muscles.
